# Fetch prices
```{r}
system("make -B")
files = list.files(path = "tmp", pattern = "*.json", full.names = TRUE)
print(files)
```

# Let's munge some JSON
```{r}
library("rjson")

for (f in files) {
  print(f)
  raw = fromJSON(file = f)

  prices = list()
  for (observation in raw$Data) prices = rbind.data.frame(prices, observation)

  time = unlist(prices$time)
  coin = unlist(prices$close)

  summary(coin)

  plot(time, coin)
}
```
